caption: The image is a red and gold card with a tiger on it. The text reads "Happy New Year!" and "Happy Chinese New Year for you and your family. May wealth always come your way."
original_title: Beige Modern Illustration Chinese New Year Greetings Instagram Story
texts:
"Happy Chinese New Year for you 
and your family. May wealth 
always come your way."

and your family. May wealth
